## Janitorial Services for the Canadian Coast Guard Base in Victoria, B.C.

### Request for Proposal - RFP

**Reference Number:** cb-697-98705814
**Solicitation Number:** 30001673
**Publication Date:** 2023-12-05
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-05T14:00:00
**Amendment Number:** 7

### Proposal Overview

The Fisheries and Oceans Canada, on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG), is seeking a contractor to provide janitorial services for the CCG Base in Victoria, B.C. The chosen contractor will be responsible for providing all necessary labor, supplies, equipment, and incidentals to maintain the cleanliness and sanitation of the base.

### Mandatory Site Visit

A mandatory site visit is scheduled for December 14, 2023, at 10:30 a.m. at the Victoria Coast Guard Base. Bidders are required to attend the site visit and submit their attendance confirmation by email to the Contracting Authority by December 12, 2023, at 11:00 a.m.

### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes:

* Providing janitorial services to the Base, which covers an approximate area of 5,885 m2
* Cleaning all buildings, including Hangar, Stores Warehouse, Main Administration Building, Workshops, Marine Environmental Hazardous Response (MEHR) Building, Buoy Maintenance Building, and Compliance & Enforcement annex trailer
* Operating 7 days a week, year-round
* Maintaining a consistent time frame for cleaning services:
	+ Monday to Friday: 3 p.m. to 11 p.m
	+ Saturday, Sunday, and statutory holidays: 9:30 a.m. to 1:30 p.m
* Ensuring the Base meets all cleaning and sanitation requirements
* Providing all necessary equipment, supplies, and labor

### Security Requirements
This contract includes security requirements.

### Period of Contract

The contract period shall be from the date of award for a duration of one (1) year, with three (3) one-year option periods.

### Trade Agreements
This requirement is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP).

### Inquiries
Inquiries regarding this RFP should be directed to Stephanie Patry, Contracting Specialist
